title: Died after a few short months.
body: After 3-4 months, of moderate usage in my Steamdeck, went to play a game one morning and the SD card just wasn’t being recognised in Windows or SteamOS, tried putting it in my DLSR, same thing, didn’t work, same with my laptop. Seems to be quite hit and miss experience wise though.

title: great buy
body: bought for a camera easy to use, fast delivery and very good value for money, really cant complain

title: Didn’t work
body: Returned item as it didn’t work in my dash cam. Never had issues with other Amazon basic products

title: Large capacity reasonable price.
body: Thought id give amazon brand a go as opposed to my usual scandisk micro cards.Excellent price,work geat

title: Great value and works brilliant on my dash cam
body: My dash cam was working fine and then prompted me with “memory card error”. I tried reviving the memory card and I gave that up and bought this product.I required a minimum of class 10 (which this is) and I wanted a good size gb to store plenty of footage in.The memory card installed in the dash cam and worked straight out the box without anything extra required. It also came with a full size sd card adapter so you can plug this into a device now like a laptop with an SD card reader to transfer your data.It comes well packaged and protected and the price was not bad at all.I would certainly buy another.

title: It works really well
body: Thank you, 128 Gigabites is a lit of space.

title: Arrived quickly
body: Got here on time and does what it is supposed to do.

title: Perfect!
body: Reads and writes quickly. 👍. Using in ASUS ZenBook

title: The card is good for everyday task
body: The card is good for storage, but very poor for high demand task like video abd music. Change twice and still getting glitches while listening music or watching videos

title: Tight fit
body: Works great after formatting was a tight fit in my phone Motorola G7 but I won't be taking it out for a few years .
